Title: The Kilgannon Corporation (No. 48)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Lukas Reiter, Marisa Tam (story editor), Taylor Martin (story editor), Dave Metzger (staff writer)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: Red and the Task Force place Dembe undercover to infiltrate an international human smuggling organization, but when communication is lost, they must intervene. Meanwhile, Tom's investigation into the suitcase lands him in grave danger.
